job.title: 100% REMOTE Lead Cloud Engineer, GCP
job.description: A large insurance company is looking for a 100 remote within US Lead Cloud Engineer and is offering up to 220000 This engineer is someone with a startup leadership mentality who can help build out their GCP environment and can bring in DevOps best practices Someone who works heavily with Terraform is skilled with container orchestration GKE EKS etc and is strong with at least one major scriptingprogramming language Python Golang Java etc who would like to lead Google Cloud architecture projects will fit in perfectly herebrbrstronguRequired Skills amp Experiencebrustrongulli7 years of experienceliliPublic cloud GCP pref open to AWS and AzureliliCluster deployment and container orchestration Docker Kubernetes etcliliInfrastructure as Code Terraform pref open to CloudformationliliScriptingprogramming Python Golang Java etcliliStrong understanding of or handson with CICD pipelines Jenkins CircleCI GithubActions etcbrliulstronguDesired Skills amp Experiencebrustrongulli23 years of GCP architectureliliTransactional database systems MySQL Postgres MongoDB etcliliMonitoring tools Dynatrace Datadog etcliliIAM Active Directory Okta etcliliNetworking knowledgebrliulWhat You Will Be DoingbrbrTech Breakdownbrulli100 Linuxlili90 GCPlili10 AWSbrliulDaily Responsibilitiesbrulli90 Hands Onlili10 Management DutiesbrliulThe OfferbrulliCompetitive compensation Up to 220k DOEbrliulstronguYou Will Receive The Following BenefitsbrustrongulliMedical Insurance amp Health Savings Account HSAlili401kliliPaid Sick Time LeaveliliPretax Commuter BenefitbrliulApplicants must be currently authorized to work in the United States on a fulltime basis now and in the futurebrbrstrongPosted Bystrong Gavin Malloybrbr
